text:
Lawdingo.com (YC W13) Seeking first employee. Company has one founder.

To get a sense for who I am, and whether you'd want to work with me, just watch the 90 second video I made for Lawdingo: youtube.com/watch?v=DQ-4tMF30e0

Ideally someone technical, extremely intelligent, UX/product genius, and interested in marketplace businesses.

I raised a fairly substantial seed round just a month ago.

nikhil@lawdingo.com
